metadata.description: Base URL for Template Files
Azure region to deploy resources to
OpenShift Master VM size
OpenShift Infra Node VM(s) size
OpenShift Compute Node VM(s) size
Use Managed or Unmanaged Disks
Number of OpenShift masters. 1 is non HA. Choose 3 or 5 for HA
Number of OpenShift infra nodes. 1 is non HA. Choose 2 or 3 for HA
Number of OpenShift compute nodes
Size of  OS disk in GB
Size of data disk in GB for Docker volume
Administrator username on all VMs and first user created for OpenShift login
Enable OpenShift Metrics: true or false
Enable OpenShift Logging: true or false
SSH public key for all VMs
Enable Azure as Cloud Provider - true or false
Azure AD Client ID
Domain search name
Domain type for web console - default (use DNS label of master infra public IP) or custom (defined in next parameter)
Custom domain name for access to OpenShift web console. Must be all lowercase
Default Subdomain type - nip.io or custom (defined in next parameter)
Default Subdomain for application routing (Wildcard DNS) - must enter something even if you are using nip.io. Must be all lowercase
Determines whether to provision a new virtual network or use an existing virtual network
Name of the resource group for the new virtual network
Name of the new virtual network
Address prefix of the new virtual network
Name of the subnet for Master nodes and Bastion node
CIDR used for the master subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix - default is 10.1.0.0/16
Name of the subnet for Infra nodes
CIDR used for the infra subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix - default is 10.2.0.0/16
Name of the subnet for Compute nodes
CIDR used for the node subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix - default is 10.3.0.0/16
Specify whether the cluster uses private or public master nodes
Static Private IP address to use for master load balancer when creating a cluster with private master nodes
Specify whether the cluster uses private or public router. Private does not expose router pods to public Internet
Static Private IP address to use for infra load balancer when creating a cluster with private infra nodes
Use custom certificate for routing domain or the default self-signed certificate
Use custom certificate for master domain or the default self-signed certificate
